message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you is $1200000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, based on my assessment of the product's value, I am only able to offer $850000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product for $950000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you is $1200000. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose an offer of $900000. I hope this is within your range and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you at $920000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you is $1200000. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go any lower.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I understand your position and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose an offer of $910000. I hope this proposal helps us reach a satisfactory agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm close to accepting, but I still need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you at $915000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you is $1200000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered your last proposal carefully. Based on our previous discussions and my assessment of the product's value, I would like to propose an offer of $912500. I hope this offer is acceptable and we can move forward towards a successful transaction.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell the product for $918750. This is my final offer, and I'm confident that it's a fair price considering the product's value to you is $1200000. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm ready to finalize the deal.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I've given it careful consideration and I'm willing to accept $917500 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value of the product to me and your asking price. I look forward to your response.
